definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: But usually in January you can't do it because it's too cold.
sentences.chinese: 但通常在一月份不能做，因爲太冷了。

sentences.english: Since november ordinarily of it early stoped action.
sentences.chinese: 既然是十一月，他們早就該停止活動了。

sentences.english: During the depression, I used to hop freights at least once a month.
sentences.chinese: 大蕭條時期，我一月至少一次要偷偷搭乘貨運列車。

sentences.english: Sadly, Dad passed away this past January.
sentences.chinese: 遺憾的是，家父已於今年一月往生。
春運於一月三十日正式開始。

sentences.english: The long-haired OA-Puss will celebrate her 24th birthday in January — much to the  astonishment of Quentin Shaw, who has owned her since 1987.
sentences.chinese: 這隻長毛貓貓，即將在一月份迎來自己的24歲生日。

sentences.english: John got sick last January and has been in bed since then.
sentences.chinese: 約翰於去年一月染疾，現仍臥病不起。

sentences.english: January was another terrible month for auto sales.
sentences.chinese: 一月是汽車銷售的又一個淡月。

sentences.english: Sometimes it is also cold in February and March.
sentences.chinese: 冬天的天氣非常的冷，在十二月和一月。

sentences.english: The curriculum centred on the extra class of winter vacation in January.
sentences.chinese: 一月份的課程集中在寒假的加課上。

sentences.english: The Golden Globe Awards are held in mid-January each year.
sentences.chinese: 金球獎固定於每年的一月中旬舉行。

sentences.english: It is November, but it is very hot.
sentences.chinese: 現在是十一月，但是天氣很熱。

sentences.english: Judging by the signs, could be late November, early December.
sentences.chinese: 從現象來看，可能是十一月底，十二月初了吧。

sentences.english: It is nto the same thing to have a bare field in January and in Juluy.
sentences.chinese: 一月和七月的荒野是截然不同的。

sentences.english: He conked out in November with pleurisy.
sentences.chinese: 他患肋膜炎於十一月份死去。

sentences.english: Is it a situation that could be revisited in January?
sentences.chinese: 這個問題可以在一月解決嗎？

definition: start of month/early in the month
